blocks.name: sbeqal1
blocks.content: If ` x = y ` always implies ` x = z ` , then ` y = z ` . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 2-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: sbeqal1i
blocks.content: Suppose you know ` x = y ` implies ` x = z ` , assuming ` x ` and ` z ` are distinct. Then, ` y = z ` . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 3-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: sbeqal2i
blocks.content: If ` x = y ` implies ` x = z ` , then we can infer ` z = y ` . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 3-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: axc5c4c711
blocks.content: Proof of a theorem that can act as a sole axiom for pure predicate calculus with ~ ax-gen as the inference rule. This proof extends the idea of ~ axc5c711 and related theorems. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm axc5c4c711(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))))), wi(w0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1)))
} = {
  ja(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))))), wi(w0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1))), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1)))
  nsyl4(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))))), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1)), wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))
  syl(wn(wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))))))
  alrimih(s1, wn(wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1))), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1))))))
  hbn1(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1))
  con1i(wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1))))))
  axc7(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))
  ax-11(s1, s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)))))
  ja(w0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, w0), w1)), wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1)))
  spsd(s1, wn(w0), w0, wal(s1, w1))
  pm2.21(w0, wal(s1, w1))
  axc4(s1, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: axc5c4c711toc5
blocks.content: Rederivation of ~ sp from ~ axc5c4c711 . Note that ~ ax6 is used for the rederivation. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jul-2011.) Revised to use ~ ax6v instead of ~ ax6 , so that this rederivation requires only ~ ax6v and propositional calculus. (Revised by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: axc5c4c711toc4
blocks.content: Rederivation of ~ axc4 from ~ axc5c4c711 . Note that only propositional calculus is required for the rederivation. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jul-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: axc5c4c711toc7
blocks.content: Rederivation of ~ axc7 from ~ axc5c4c711 . Note that neither ~ axc7 nor ~ ax-11 are required for the rederivation. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jul-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axc5c4c711toc7(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0)))), w0)
} = {
  3syl(wn(wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0)))), w0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))), wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))
  con3i(wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))))
  sps(s0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0))))
  alimi(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))), wn(wal(s0, w0)))
  con3i(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))), wal(s0, w0))
  axc4i(s0, w0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))
  alimi(s0, w0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))
  ax-1(w0, wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)))
  syl6(wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0, wal(s0, w0))
  syl(wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))), wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), wal(s0, w0)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))), wi(wi(w0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))
  pm2.21(wal(s0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))), wi(wi(w0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))
  axc5c4c711(s0, s0, wi(w0, w0), w0)
  sp(s0, w0)
  mpg(s0, wi(wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0), w0), wi(w0, w0))
  pm2.27(wal(s0, wi(w0, w0)), w0)
  id(w0)
}

blocks.name: axc5c4c711to11
blocks.content: Rederivation of ~ ax-11 from ~ axc5c4c711 . Note that ~ ax-11 is not required for the rederivation. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jul-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axc5c4c711to11(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
} = {
  3syl(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))
  2alimi(s0, s1, w0, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))
  ax-1(w0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)))
  syl(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))), wal(s1, wn(wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))))
  con4i(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))), wal(s1, wn(wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))))
  axc5c4c711toc7(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))
  alimi(s1, wn(wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))), wal(s0, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))
  nsyl4(wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))), wal(s0, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))))))
  alimi(s0, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))), wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))
  syl(wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))), wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))), wi(wi(w0, w0), wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))
  pm2.21(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))), wi(wi(w0, w0), wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))
  syl6(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))))), wi(wi(w0, w0), wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)))), wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0, wal(s1, w0))
  axc5c4c711(s0, s1, wi(w0, w0), w0)
  sp(s1, w0)
  axc5c4c711toc7(s0, wal(s1, wn(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0))))))
  2alimi(s1, s0, wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0), w0)
  mpg(s1, wi(wi(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0), w0), wi(w0, w0))
  pm2.27(wal(s1, wi(w0, w0)), w0)
  id(w0)
}

blocks.name: axc11next
blocks.content: This theorem shows that, given ~ axext4 , we can derive a version of ~ axc11n . However, it is weaker than ~ axc11n because it has a distinct variable requirement. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 16-Jul-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axc11next(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3imtr4i(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wal(s1, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  3syl(wal(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wal(s1, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), wal(s1, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))
  axc4i(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  mpcom(wal(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  alimi(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ax-ext(hs0, s0, s1)
  sps(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wal(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))))
  syl5(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(hs0, wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  ax-11(s0, hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  alimdv(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  syl9(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  syl(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  alimi(s0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  biimpr(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  stdpc5v(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  alrimiv(s1, wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  alcoms(s0, hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  alimi(hs0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  sylbi(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wi(wex(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  19.23(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  nfa1(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  imim12i(wex(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wex(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  cbvexvw(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  elequ2(s1, s0, hs0)
  cbvalivw(s0, s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  ax9(s0, s1, hs0)
  axc4i(s1, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  alcoms(s1, hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  alimi(hs0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  sylbi(wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(wex(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  19.23(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  nfa1(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  impbid(wi(wex(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  imim12i(wex(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  19.8a(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  spimvw(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  ax9(s1, s0, hs0)
  imim12i(wex(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  sylib(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  19.8a(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  cbvexvw(s0, s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  elequ2(s0, s1, hs0)
  sp(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  albii(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  axext4(s0, s1, hs0)
  albii(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  axext4(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wal.s(s1, s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  diff.wal.s(s1, hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  diff.wal.s(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axc11next(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, s0 = s1)→ ∀(s1, s1 = s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3imtr4i(∀(s0, s0 = s1), ∀(s1, s1 = s0), ∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1))), ∀(s1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s1 ↔ hs0 ∈ s0))))
  3syl(∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1))), ∀(s1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s1 ↔ hs0 ∈ s0))), ∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0)))), ∀(s1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s1 → ∀(s1, hs0 ∈ s1)))))
  axc4i(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1)), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0))))
  mpcom(∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1))), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0))), ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  alimi(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1)), s0 = s1)
  ax-ext(hs0, s0, s1)
  sps(s0, s0 = s1, (∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1)))→ ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0)))))
  syl5(s0 = s1, ∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1))), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0))), ∀(hs0, ∀(s0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1))))
  ax-11(s0, hs0, (hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1))
  alimdv(hs0, s0 = s1, ∀(s0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1)), (hs0 ∈ s0 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0)))
  syl9(s0 = s1, ∀(s0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1)), hs0 ∈ s0, ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0), hs0 ∈ s1)
  syl(∀(s0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1)), (hs0 ∈ s1 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0)), ∀(s0,(hs0 ∈ s1 → hs0 ∈ s0)))
  alimi(s0, (hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs0 ∈ s1), (hs0 ∈ s1 → hs0 ∈ s0))
  biimpr(hs0 ∈ s0, hs0 ∈ s1)
  stdpc5v(s0, hs0 ∈ s1, hs0 ∈ s0)
  alrimiv(s1, ∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ s0)))), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s1 → ∀(s1, hs0 ∈ s1))))
